q: why do they use a timer in the video
pred: The timer in the video is used to keep track of the time the boy is taking to solve the puzzle. The timer is placed on the table in front of the boy, and it helps him to focus on the task at hand and ensure that he completes it within the given time frame. This can be particularly helpful in competitive situations, where the boy needs to demonstrate his speed and problem-solving skills to impress the audience or judges.
